com.pcloud.protocol.streaming

Interface ProtocolWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProtocolRequestWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BytesWriter

    public interface ProtocolWriter
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
    A contract for a writer object which can write data into a data sink
    See Also:
    BytesWriter, ValueWriter

    • Method Detail

      • writeName

        ProtocolWriter writeName(java.lang.String name)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Write a key for a data pair

        The data is written in key - value pairs so every call of this method should be followed by one of the writeValue overloads.

        Parameters:
        name - the key for this data pair
        Returns:
        a reference to this object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on failed IO operations

      • writeValue

        ProtocolWriter writeValue(java.lang.Object value)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Write a value for a data pair

        Every call to this or the other overloads should be preceded by a call to writeName(String)

        Parameters:
        value - an object to be written in the data sink
        Returns:
        a reference to this object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on failed IO operations
